summary: ICP (Internet Computer) full-stack application template for “Vision Galaxy Society” with a Motoko backend (RBAC) and React+Vite+Tailwind (shadcn/ui) frontend including Internet Identity authentication, multi-role dashboards/CRUD pages, build/deploy tooling and generated brand assets; now includes installable PWA mobile delivery plus an in-app notifications center, while push notifications/APK remain future work.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister project wired into build/deploy pipeline, with main entrypoint and supporting modules.

existing_features.title: Role-based authorization & access control
existing_features.description: Authorization modules added (MixinAuthorization, access-control) to enforce permissions and role-scoped actions.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration (frontend)
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and actor integration for Internet Identity login and authenticated canister calls.

existing_features.title: React+Vite+Tailwind frontend scaffold with shadcn/ui component library
existing_features.description: Frontend app scaffolded with Tailwind and a large set of shadcn/ui components and supporting configs (eslint, tsconfig, postcss, vite).

existing_features.title: Multi-role application pages and routing
existing_features.description: Implemented pages for resident/flat, guard, and secretary roles including dashboards and operational pages (notices, complaints, expenditures, visitors, payments, overdue, settings, profile).

existing_features.title: Build template and deployment tooling
existing_features.description: Added build-template workspace including Dockerfile, deployment scripts/config, pnpm workspace, and image processing scripts.

existing_features.title: Generated brand assets
existing_features.description: Generated and included branded background and logo images under frontend/public/assets/generated.

existing_features.title: Progressive Web App (PWA) support (installable)
existing_features.description: Frontend is now installable as a PWA via manifest.webmanifest and service worker integration, with a supporting install UX hook (usePwaInstall) for mobile-friendly delivery.

existing_features.title: In-app notifications center (non-push)
existing_features.description: Added an in-app notifications experience surfaced via a dedicated Notifications page, covering key events such as overdue reminders, new notices, and visitor request status changes (non-push).

existing_features.title: End-to-end Internet Identity auth flow & gating
existing_features.description: Completed end-to-end Internet Identity integration: login page triggers II, authenticated identity gates app routes, and logout clears identity/cached state without modifying immutable hook files.

existing_features.title: Update the IC mainnet deployment helper tooling to support an explicit retry mode for transient deployment failures (including the known "CaLM permanent canister reservation failed" case), so an operator can run one command that retries `dfx deploy --network ic` multiple times with configurable delay and clear console guidance.

Add a pre-deployment cycles readiness check to the deployment helper flow so operators are guided to verify cycles/wallet availability before attempting IC mainnet deployment, with clear English-only instructions and commands to run when cycles are missing or not configured.

architecturalNotes: Project structured as an Internet Computer (ICP) full-stack app with a Motoko backend canister and a React (Vite) frontend.
Authentication uses Internet Identity on the frontend with an actor-based canister client.
Authorization enforced via backend access-control modules (role-based authorization).
Frontend uses TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui component set; repository includes a reusable build-template workspace and deployment scripts/config.
Add a mobile delivery strategy (e.g., PWA and/or Android APK wrapper) to enable access on phones.
Mobile delivery now supports an installable PWA via web manifest + service worker, with frontend install prompting/UX handled by a dedicated hook.
In-app (non-push) notifications are presented via a dedicated Notifications page/experience tied into the existing role-based UI.
knownIssues: Mainnet (production) deployment failed with error: "CaLM permanent canister reservation failed".
Subsequent attempt to complete production deployment failed generically: "Deployment failed" (no additional error details provided).
